errors.error_description: The link to the vespacli README points to the `main` branch, but the repository's default branch is `master`, resulting in a 404 error.
correction_candidates: The link should point to the `master` branch: `https://github.com/vespa-engine/pyvespa/tree/master/vespacli`.
The link should be a relative path to the file: `./vespacli/README.md`.
The vespacli README has been moved to the root directory.
The repository's default branch should be renamed from `master` to `main` to match the link.
errors.golden_answer: The link should point to the `master` branch: `https://github.com/vespa-engine/pyvespa/tree/master/vespacli`.

errors.error_description: The example command `ruff --fix .` for running the linter manually is syntactically incorrect.
correction_candidates: The correct command to check for errors is `ruff check .`.
The correct command to format files is `ruff format .`.
The correct command to check for errors and apply fixes is `ruff check . --fix`.
errors.golden_answer: The correct command to check for errors and apply fixes is `ruff check . --fix`.
